name: {{countryCode}} Alert Condition - {{appName}} - Application - Non Web - Abnormal Response times

nrql.query: SELECT percentile(duration, 95) AS '95th Percentile Response Time' FROM Transaction WHERE clusterName = cluster_name AND namespaceName IN (namespace_names) AND appName IN (appNames) AND name LIKE 'OtherTransaction/Custom%' FACET name
